title: To the Nightingale - what speaker is searching for

content.prompt: In lines 16-21 (“Sweet . . . join”), the speaker is searching for

choices.label: an intellectual understanding of the nightingale’s song
harmony with the nightingale’s natural environment
words that are compatible with the nightingale’s music
an end to the suffering caused by the nightingale’s song

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
